name: Unotech Mail Archival [Alpha]
short_description:
A hassle free mail archiving software that effectively assists you in your mail archiving needs. 

Benefits:

Mails can be physically stored on a server, External HD or Remote Server as a mounted folder.
Granular control over individual files
Mail forwarding to current ID.
Easier Auditing with audit trail.

Built on a robust platform of PHP Codeignitor Framework & Mongo DB, that can handle and process large data.

There are 2 parts to the system :

Scanner
This system keeps track of the mail files in specified folders. These folders can be scanned and new mails files found will also be tracked. 


Front-facing Interface:
This interface currently authenticates against OpenLDAP, pulls the user email address from LDAP and shows the emails that are relevant to that user. Users search for emails by to, from, subject and between a date range. Relevant audit logs can also be viewed using this interface.
summary: An OpenSource *nix based email archival system
